about_the_game:
What speed would make the roller coaster go off the track? Experience a realistic yet crazy riding of Roller Coaster now! Can you reach the end safely in limited time? Accelerate the roller coaster boldly but cautiously, feeling your heartbeat and excitement now! Remember that it's just a game, and please don't hold your breath while playing, even at the most exciting moment. Hope you enjoy it!

In this game, Infinite Coaster, you will experience a realistic yet crazy riding of Roller Coaster. To make the passengers feel excited but also let them reach the end safely in limited time, you have to speed up boldly on certain sections, but slow down perfectly on sharp turns to save time, and choose the right track to avoid oncoming collision from another roller coaster. All these micro-operations can be completed with just one hand, by your mouse or SPACE key or S key, making this game very easy to learn and play for players of all ages.

Infinite Coaster Features：
1. Real roller coaster ride experience
2. Stunning and stylized art style graphics
3. Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay
4. Multiple amazing looking roller coasters
5. Does not require high device performance and can be played offline
6. Worth playing over and over again to get high scores and dominate leaderboards

name: Infinite Coaster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: 8th Gen Core i3 or AMD with similar performance
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Core i5 or AMD with similar performance
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4G Independent Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: What speed would make the roller coaster go off the track? Experience a realistic yet crazy riding of Roller Coaster now! Can you reach the end safely in limited time? Accelerate the roller coaster boldly but cautiously, feeling your heartbeat and excitement now! Try now!
